title: London/South Kensington-Chelsea
name: Sole Luna Pizza & Pasta
directions: Adjacent to the northern exit from South Kensington underground station
content: This Italian bistro-style restaurant offers good food but the prices are too high compared to the rather bad service. The waiters, which change often, are not very attentive and almost yank the plates and glasses from the customer as soon as they have finished. The restaurant can be very busy due to its location, but the service leaves a lot to be desired.
